enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve operations related to BUSD auto-conversion settings.
coinInfo method provides information about coins, which can be useful for setting up the context before switching BUSD auto-conversion.
busdConvert method should be invoked after switching BUSD auto-conversion to ensure the conversion settings are applied correctly.
busdConvertHistory method can be used to verify the history of conversions after switching BUSD auto-conversion.
